::Battera::

She woke up and stretched.  She got up and walked to the door of her 
room.  She walked out and went down the hallway to the bridge to look 
for someone to talk to.  She was one who enjoyed the company of other 
bots.  She didn't worry about being attacked for she was now somewhat 
friends with Rex and Chordate.  At least, she hoped they were her 
friends.
